demo.cipher

Class PBE

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo.cipher.PBE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAIKDemo

    public class PBE
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAIKDemo
    Demonstrates the usage of the PKCS#5 PBES1 password based encryption scheme as used by PBE ciphers described in PKCS#5 and PKCS#12.
    Version:
    File Revision 13

    • Method Detail

      • testCipher

        public boolean testCipher(java.lang.String algorithm,
                 java.lang.String secretKeyFactory,
                 byte[] data,
                 char[] password)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Uses the given PBE cipher to PBE encrypt/decrypt the data with the given password.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the PBE algorithm to be used
        secretKeyFactory - the secret key factory to be used for generating a key from the password
        data - the data to be encrypted
        password - the password to be used
        Returns:
        true if en/decryption is succeeds, false if it fails
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the test.
        Specified by:
        start in interface IAIKDemo

        Performs some tests for Password Based Encryption ciphers.
